issue.title: Signature::OneOf
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11652](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11652). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There needs to be a way of defining a function signature that supports multiple strict options:

e.g. `lpad`
[string, int] or [string, int, string]

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11652?focusedCommentId=17288092) by Mike Seddon (MikeSeddonAU):*
Resolved in ARROW-11426
